name: Cycling Legends: Team Manager
description:
Cycling Legends: Team Manager is a thrilling and immersive sports management game that puts you in charge of your own cycling team. As the manager, you will have to strategize, train and lead your team to victory in races and climb up the leaderboard rankings.

The game offers an extensive roster of customizable riders with unique abilities and strengths, allowing you to create a team that suits your preferences and racing style. You can also upgrade your team’s bicycles with the latest equipment and technology to boost performance on the track.

In Cycling Legends: Team Manager, you can compete in a range of races, from individual time trials to multi-stage tours, across different terrains. Winning races will earn you prize money and valuable experience points, which can be used to further develop your team and unlock achievements.

You can also join cycling clubs and compete against other players in multiplayer races, showcasing your team's skills and progress. In addition, you can manage your roster, hire and fire riders, negotiate contracts, and build team morale.

Cycling Legends: Team Manager offers a comprehensive and immersive gameplay experience and featuring stunning graphics. With its challenging gameplay, competitive multiplayer mode, and exciting achievements, Cycling Legends: Team Manager is the ultimate cycling management game that will keep you engaged and entertained for hours on end.

Become the best cycling manager ever! Win races, upgrade cyclists, manage your roster and rise through leaderboards.

The features of the game include:
- Tech tree where you can upgrade bicycle
- Club and club competitions against real player
- Mulitplayer (PVP)
- Leaderboard
- Team management
- Cycling minigames that will test your skill
